DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim study investigate retrospective database assessment clinical effectiveness type 2 diabetes patient treat liraglutide primary care center Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Database Assessment Clinical Effectiveness Type 2 Diabetes Patients Treated With Liraglutide From Primary Care Centers Sweden
DOC.criteria: Patients EMR ( electronic medical record ) system primary care Sweden Patients equal 18 year age Starting treatment liraglutide sitagliptin January 2010 December 2013 Minimum 180 day prior followup/history within database index date Patients cancer , end stage liver disease , end stage renal failure ( nondiabetes relate ) Female patient gestational diabetes pregnancy Patients previous GLP1 ( glucagonlike peptide1 ) DPPIV ( dipeptidyl peptidase4 ) inhibitor use , i.e . patient incretin na√Øve
